In fact, the history of his rise from his unhappy broken home shows this to be far from the case. After being taken in by ... Directed by: Edgar G. Ulmer Actors: Production Company: Arthur S. Lyons Productions Release Date: 4 November 1948 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Horace Vendig shows himself to the world as a rich philanthropist. In fact, the history of his rise from his unhappy broken home shows this to be far from the case. After being taken in by richer neighbours he started to exhibit an obsessive and selfish urge to make more and more money, loving and leaving women at will to further this end.

sources.title: Ruthless (1948) Dir: Edgar G. Ulmer, Starring Louis Hayward, Raymond Burr, Zachary Scott
sources.description: Ruthless is a 1948 American drama Film Noir directed by Edgar G. Ulmer starring Raymond Burr, Zachary Scott, Sydney Greenstreet, Louis Hayward, Diana Lynn.   Some may not consider Ruthless to be a fully qualified noir but in actuality, it contains many of the characteristics generally found in movies of this type such as: use of shadows, cutting dialogue, flashbacks, inhumanity, corruption, fatal ending, and so on.   Find out more about the movie here .
